DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number to indicate the absolute measurement of carbon monoxide (CO) transfer from inspired gas to pulmonary capillary blood during the test measured in ml/min/mmhg.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Absolute Carbon Monoxide Diffusing Capability Test Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Complete and without restriction or qualification; something that does not depend on anything else; not relative._A measurement of carbon monoxide (CO) transfer from inspired gas to pulmonary capillary blood. During the test, the subject inspires a gas containing CO and one or more tracer gases to allow determination of the gas exchanging capability of the lungs._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Absolute Carbon Monoxide Diffusing Capability Test
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Complete and without restriction or qualification; something that does not depend on anything else; not relative.:A measurement of carbon monoxide (CO) transfer from inspired gas to pulmonary capillary blood. During the test, the subject inspires a gas containing CO and one or more tracer gases to allow determination of the gas exchanging capability of the lungs.

Concepts.definition: Complete and without restriction or qualification; something that does not depend on anything else; not relative.

A measurement of carbon monoxide (CO) transfer from inspired gas to pulmonary capillary blood. During the test, the subject inspires a gas containing CO and one or more tracer gases to allow determination of the gas exchanging capability of the lungs.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/11/18 jk added application status. 8/28/16 jk created for MCL V-Lung content.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number used to indicate the lung function test result.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/21/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review.

DataElement.changeDescription: 3/21/22 jk Vanderbilt Imaging AI, released as part of quarterly draft content review and prior reviews with SME.  8/7/18 ls updated to text short name.6/11/18 jk added application status. 8/28/16 jk created for MCL V-Lung content.
